sqlMap.update: update tbl_user set username = #user.username#, password = #user.password#, org_unit_id = #organization.id#, person_id = #user.person.id#, last_changed = now() where user_id = #user.id# and last_changed = #user.lastChanged#;
sqlMap.delete: delete from tbl_user where user_id = #user.id# and last_changed = #user.lastChanged#
